Race.SpecificTitle: Member of School Board -- District  4, Seat B
Member of School Board -- District  5, Seat A
Member of School Board -- District  6, Seat A
PW Fantasy Sports -- Authorize Fantasy Sports Contests - Act 322, 2018
Race.SummaryText: PROPOSITION TO AUTHORIZE FANTASY SPORTS CONTESTS.
Race.FullText: Shall fantasy sports contests be permitted in the parish of Ascension?

Race.SpecificTitle: E. Ascension Cons. Gravity Drainage Dist. No. 1 -- 5.0 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
East Ascension Consolidated Gravity Drainage District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall East Ascension Consolidated Gravity Drainage District No. 1 of the Parish of Ascension, Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to renew the levy and collection, and adopt an ordinance providing for such levy and collection, of a special ad valorem tax of 5.0 mills on the dollar of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation within the boundaries of the District (the "Tax") (an estimated $5,600,000 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the tax collection for the year 2019 and annually thereafter to and including the year 2028, and shall the proceeds of said Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) be used entirely and exclusively to provide funds to pay the operation and maintenance costs and expenses of the drainage works of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: West Ascension Hospital Service Dist. -- 1/2% to 1/4% S&U Tax Reduction - BOC
Race.SummaryText:
West Ascension Hospital Service District Proposition
(Reduction of Sales and Use Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall the existing tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) accruing for the benefit of the West Ascension Parish Hospital Service District, Parish of Ascension, State of Louisiana (the "District") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the District, be reduced, in accordance with the provisions of Act No. 330 of the Regular Session of the Legislature of Louisiana for the year 2017 and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, to a tax of one-fourth of one percent (1/4%), with the avails or proceeds of said tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of administering and collecting the tax) to be dedicated and pledged for the purposes of (1) constructing, acquiring, improving, enlarging, extending and renovating hospital facilities for the District, including any necessary buildings, machinery, equipment, furnishings, and sites therefor, and/or (2) paying the costs of providing hospital services furnished by the hospital facilities of the District and operating and maintaining such facilities?
